// USER LOG IN SQL
CREATE TABLE user_login(
	user_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_fname VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	user_lname VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	user_gender VARCHAR(6),
	user_dob VARCHAR(20),
	user_caddress VARCHAR(100),
	user_carea VARCHAR(25),
	user_cthana VARCHAR(25),
	user_cdistrict VARCHAR(25),
	user_czip INT(4),
	user_paddress VARCHAR(100),
	user_parea VARCHAR(25),
	user_pthana VARCHAR(25),
	user_pdistrict VARCHAR(25),
	user_pzip INT(4),
	user_image LONGBLOB,
	user_phone VARCHAR(11),
	user_job VARCHAR(50),
	user_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	user_pwd VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	resetcode VARCHAR(8),
	currentTime VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	conditions VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL
)
// NEW POST TABLE SQL QUERY
CREATE TABLE newpost(
	post_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT NOT NULL,
	post_title VARCHAR(100),
	post_rent INT(7) NOT NULL,
	post_owner_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
	post_phone_number INT(11) NOT NULL,
	post_p_type VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_type_of_Rent VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_allowed_people VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_description VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_religion VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
	post_size INT(7),
	post_district VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_thana VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
	post_area VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL,
	post_address VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,
	post_zip INT(4),
	post_f1 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f2 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f3 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f4 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f5 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f6 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f7 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f8 VARCHAR(3),
	post_f9 VARCHAR(3),
	post_time VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	post_access_mode VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
	post_active VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_login(user_id)
)
// POST IMAGE SQL
CREATE TABLE postimage(
	image_id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
	post_id INT NOT NULL,
	user_id INT NOT NULL,
	image_path LONGBLOB,
	
)
